# 1.2.0 (2021-08-03)

* Upgrade to Cstruct 6.0.0

# 1.1.0 (2020-03-31)

* Use mirage-crypto instead of nocrypto (by @hannesm)
* Stop using Salsa20_core.Utils (by @hannesm)

# 1.0.0 (2019-04-12)

* Move to dune
* Upgrade to opam 2.0
* Simplify `decrypt` function implementation

# 0.1.0 (2017-10-30)

* Initial release
